channel.title: triple j: Sunday Night Safran
channel.description: John Safran and Father Bob Maguire are back with their own take on religion, politics and all things ethnic. This duo can talk-up a storm, so we've taken the program, cut out the music to produce a 60-70min program.
channel.itunes:author: triple j
channel.itunes:summary: Religion. Politics and Hoochies. John Safran and Father Bob talk-up a storm, so we've taken the program, cut out the music to produce a 60-70min program.
channel.itunes:keywords: australian, music, triple j, religion, politics, hoochies, john safran, father bob

image.title: triple j: sunday night safran
